functions.name: Message

parameters.name: msg
parameters.description: The message you want to show the user.

functions.description: Shows a message to the user.

functions.name: GetHealth
functions.description: Returns the health of the subject.

functions.name: AddItem

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item you want to add to the container.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of items you want to add.

functions.description: Adds the given item the given times to the container. Returns True if the add was successful, False otherwise.

functions.name: GetNumberOfItems

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item you want to find out how many the subject has.

functions.description: Returns how many of the specified item is in the subject's inventory.
